name: NEWT Prototype
description:
Playtesting Feedback: https://forms.gle/HqMd2e1RmaUENpoFA

If you have a black screen, just stay on the page, it may take a minute or two to load.

Hold Left-click - To shoot plant sprayer

Hold Right-click - To suck up trash

WASD - To move

Space - Jump

Collect the notebook pages and trash and plant enough flowers to win.

The latest version can be played in-browser, older versions can be downloaded below.

Mentor: Katie Greene http://katieagreen.com/
